SEARCH
Package model

Class Map

java.lang.Object
model.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Map extends Object implements Serializable
This is the model class for the Map used in the game. This class consists of all the data members and behavior associated with Map. This class includes methods to add/remove continents, countries and borders as well as loadmap and savemap functionalities.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map()
      This is the default constructor of the class. When the map object is created, this class initializes Continent, Countries and Neighbour containers

  • Method Details

    • getCountryList

      public ArrayList<Country> getCountryList()
      This method returns the ArrayList of country objects
      Returns:
      ArrayList of CountryObjects

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method initializes the map from scratch by clearing all the containers inside it. This method clears Continent, Country and Neighbor containers. This method also set the static IDs of Country and Continents back to zero.

    • loadMap

      public String loadMap(String p_FileName) throws Exception
      This method loads a map file given by the user.
      • This method checks for the input and decides if it is a loadmap or editmap functionality.
      • It gets the data from file and loads the map object in respective continent, countries and neighbors.
      • Before loading or editing any file, it resets the game model so that it doesn't conflict with the existing data in map model.
      Parameters:
      p_FileName - Name of the file to Load
      Returns:
      Map is loaded or not
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - File not Found to Load
      Exception

    • saveMap

      public String saveMap(String p_FileName) throws Exception
      It saves the user edited map. It checks for the validation of the map object and then only it saves into the file.
      Parameters:
      p_FileName - File name to save the map
      Returns:
      If Map is saved successfully or not
      Throws:
      Exception - No continent to save

    • addContinent

      public void addContinent(String p_ContinentName, String p_ContinentControlValue) throws Exception
      This method receives ContinentName and its Control value from the user through command and saves the continent in map.
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - Name of the continent to be added
      p_ContinentControlValue - Control value of the continent to be added
      Throws:
      Exception - In case of continent already exists, it throws an exception

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent(String p_ContinentName) throws Exception
      This method removes the continent when user enters remove continent command. It also removes all the countries inside that continent.
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - Name of the continent to be removed
      Throws:
      Exception - In case the continent doesn't exist, it throws an exception

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry(String p_CountryName, String p_ContinentName) throws Exception
      This method adds a new country in the map.
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the country to be added
      p_ContinentName - Name of the parent continent
      Throws:
      Exception - In case country already exists, it throws an exception

    • removeCountry

      public void removeCountry(String p_CountryName, boolean p_IsOnlyCountryRemove) throws Exception
      This method removes the country from the map. This method is used at two places. 1) editcountry remove 2) editcontinent remove (to remove all countries of continent)
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the country to be removed
      p_IsOnlyCountryRemove - This flag tells the method if it is a editcontinent command or editcountry. True for editcountry
      Throws:
      Exception - if country in the list doesn't exist, it throws an exception

    • removeCountryFromContinent

      public void removeCountryFromContinent(String p_CountryName, ArrayList<Country> p_CountryListOfSpecificContinent)
      This method is called to remove specific country from the country list of continent
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the country to be removed
      p_CountryListOfSpecificContinent - List of all countries of the parent continent where this country belongs

    • removeAllCountryInContinent

      public void removeAllCountryInContinent(Continent p_TempContinent) throws Exception
      This method removes all the countries in a given continent.
      Parameters:
      p_TempContinent - Reference of continent object for which all countries are to be removed.
      Throws:
      Exception - throws exception in case of error

    • addBorder

      public void addBorder(String p_CountryName, String p_NeighborName) throws Exception
      This method adds the border between two countries in the map. This is a one directional addition of border from source to target country.
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the source country
      p_NeighborName - Name of the target country
      Throws:
      Exception - Neighbor, Country not exists

    • removeBorder

      public void removeBorder(String p_CountryName, String p_NeighbourName) throws Exception
      This method removes the border between source and target. Uni-directional remove only
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the source country
      p_NeighbourName - Name of the target country
      Throws:
      Exception - Country, Neighbor not exists

    • getContinentList

      public ArrayList<Continent> getContinentList()
      This method is to get list of continents
      Returns:
      ArrayList of continents

    • getContinents

      public void getContinents()
      This method prints the list of continents

    • getCountries

      public void getCountries()
      This method prints the list of countries

    • validateMap

      public String validateMap() throws Exception
      This method is used to validate the map. It creates an object of validate map and pass the neighbors hashmap to it.
      Returns:
      It returns the string to inform if map is valid or not.
      Throws:
      Exception - The countries are not internally connected
